name: Macrotis: A Mother's Journey
description: Help Mother Bilby, as she struggles underground to find her children, in this magical indie, 2.5D puzzle-platformer game. Macrotis: A Mother’s Journey is an unforgettable adventure for those who love being challenged.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 处理器: Intel® Core™ i3 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce 840M DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 10 处理器: Intel® Core™ i5 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
